= Introduction =
The road map outlines the guideline which is necessary to follow during the entire project.  

= Concepts =
The following concepts need to be addressed before code is written.  If the questions do not have answers, it will become more difficult later in the development process.

- Protocol Implementation
  > HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS, or Transparent?  Software, hardware, or both?
- Masked Communication 
  > Can we look like some other protocol?  How easy/hard is identify traffic going to be?
- IPv6
  > IPv4 address space will run out in a few years.  Are we going to be ready?
- Any others??
